home.welcome: Hello, I am Fabian, a full stack developer.

about.firstParagraph: Hello! I'm Fabian Lopez, a Full Stack Developer who loves creating efficient and fabulous websites. I'm always exploring new technologies to deliver the best solutions.
about.secondParagraph: My diverse journey includes running a transportation company and earning a Business Administration degree in a different country. Coupled with my passion for software development, I bring a unique understanding of both the technical and business aspects of every project.
about.thirdParagraph: I'm committed to helping you achieve your goals.

wannago.Name: WannaGo
wannago.Short Description: Plan, invite, and track your events in real time.
wannago.Description: Take control of your plans with WannaGo! Craft exciting plans, invite your friends and family, and stay updated in real time. Who's seen the plan? Who's in? Who's out? With WannaGo, you're always in the loop. Don't just make plansâ€”bring them to life with WannaGo. Let's get planning, let's get going, let's get engaged!
wannago.Responsibilities: UX/UI design. Entire development of the web app.

huddler.Name: Huddler
huddler.Short Description: Share your interests, discover activities, and join or host events.
huddler.Description: Connect and create with Huddler, a platform uniting people through shared passions. With Huddler, say goodbye to solo activities. Discover, join, or kick-off events, be it fishing or baking. At Huddler there is room for every passion. Mingle with like-minded folks, share joyful experiences. Find your tribe with Huddler.
huddler.Responsibilities: Helped in design. Devised the 'recommended' algorithm. Implemented authorization & user settings

road-trip.Name: Road Trip - Campgrounds
road-trip.Short Description: Discover new campsites, share experiences, and contribute to the road trip community
road-trip.Description: Embark on your next journey with Road Trips - Campgrounds. It's the go-to web for road trip lovers. Find campsites, rate experiences, and add new locations. Whether a road trip expert or a newbie, it's your outdoor guide. Hit the open road with Road Trips - Campgrounds and let the adventure begin.
road-trip.Responsibilities: Refactor codebase from JavaScript to Typescript

Images.alt: Road trip form for new campsites

portfolio.Name: Fabian's Portfolio
portfolio.Description: This is my portfolio. Here you can learn a little bit about me, find some of my projects, and contact me.
portfolio.Responsibilities: UX/UI design for desktop and mobile devices. Enable dark mode. Enable two languages
